com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice

Interface IItemHistoryService


  • public interface IItemHistoryService
    Contains methods for retrieving the merge and version histories of specific Items, as well associated methods that provide more detail about other Items involved in merging and editing operations.

    The methods of IItemHistoryService obey the same set of access, security, and prohibition rules as those of IItemRetrievalService.

    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoreItemComparison compareItemVersions(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, long olderVersion, long newerVersion)
      Compares the two specified versions of the specified Item.
      ItemHistory retrieveItemHistory(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, Boundary start, Boundary end, List<VersionChangeType> changeTypes, int maxVersionCount, OverflowPolicy overflowPolicy)
      Retrieves an ItemHistory that contains summary information about the changes that have taken place to the specified Item between two specified points.
      List<MergeHistory> retrieveMergeHistories(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers, int depth)
      Retrieves MergeHistorys that contain summary information about any Items that were merged to create the specified Items, up to the specified depth.
      List<MergePopulation> retrieveMergePopulations(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers)
      Retrieves a MergePopulation for each of the specified Items, containing summary information about all the Items that have been merged into the Item, and all the Items into which its content has been merged.
      List<MergeProductResult> retrieveMergeProducts(List<ItemIdentifier> sourceItemIdentifiers)
      Retrieves MergeProductResults that contain summary information about the most recent Items to which each of the specified Items have contributed content, through merge operations.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveItemHistory

        ItemHistory retrieveItemHistory(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                Boundary start,
                                Boundary end,
                                List<VersionChangeType> changeTypes,
                                int maxVersionCount,
                                OverflowPolicy overflowPolicy)
                         throws ItemNotFoundException,
                                InvalidArgumentException
        Retrieves an ItemHistory that contains summary information about the changes that have taken place to the specified Item between two specified points.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item whose history is to be retrieved.
        start - A Boundary defining the start of the version range for which history will be retrieved.
        end - A Boundary defining the end of the version range for which history will be retrieved.
        changeTypes - The VersionChangeTypes that should appear in the ItemHistory.
        maxVersionCount - The maximum number of versions to appear in the ItemHistory. This cannot be more than the server-defined maximum. (Contact the system administrator for details.)
        overflowPolicy - The OverflowPolicy that describes how the method behaves when the maximum number of versions is exceeded.
        Returns:
        See above. The ItemHistory will be empty if no versions matched the specified criteria.
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - If the specified Item does not exist, or the current user cannot see it.
        InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid according to the rules above, if the version specified by start is later than the version specified by end, or if the TimeZone SOAP header is not provided.

      • compareItemVersions

        CoreItemComparison compareItemVersions(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                       long olderVersion,
                                       long newerVersion)
                                throws ItemNotFoundException,
                                       InvalidArgumentException
        Compares the two specified versions of the specified Item.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item whose versions are to be compared.
        olderVersion - The earlier of the two version numbers.
        newerVersion - The later of the two version numbers.
        Returns:
        A CoreItemComparison containing information about the differences between the two versions, according to the following rules:
        • If the Item is an Entity, and the user has at least SecurityAccessLevel.READ_ONLY on both versions, then the CoreItemComparison is an EntityComparison.
        • If the Item is a Link, and the user has at least SecurityAccessLevel.READ_ONLY on both versions, then the CoreItemComparison is a LinkComparison.
        • If the Item is an Entity or a Link, but the user has only SecurityAccessLevel.READ_CLOAKED on one (or both) of the requested versions, then the CoreItemComparison is an ItemPlaceholderComparison.
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - If the specified Item does not exist, or it does not have one of the versions that was requested, or it has an ItemType that has the ProhibitedRetrieve indicator, or the current user has SecurityAccessLevel.NONE on one (or both) of the requested versions.
        InvalidArgumentException - If the "older" version is not older than the "newer" version.

      • retrieveMergeProducts

        List<MergeProductResult> retrieveMergeProducts(List<ItemIdentifier> sourceItemIdentifiers)
                                        throws RequestTooLargeException
        Retrieves MergeProductResults that contain summary information about the most recent Items to which each of the specified Items have contributed content, through merge operations.

        If a specified Item has never been merged into another, then no MergeProductResult is returned for that Item.

        Parameters:
        sourceItemIdentifiers - ItemIdentifiers of Items whose merge products are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        RequestTooLargeException - If the number of specified ItemIdentifiers is higher than the server-imposed limit.
        Since:
        4.0

      • retrieveMergePopulations

        List<MergePopulation> retrieveMergePopulations(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers)
                                        throws RequestTooLargeException
        Retrieves a MergePopulation for each of the specified Items, containing summary information about all the Items that have been merged into the Item, and all the Items into which its content has been merged.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifiers - ItemIdentifiers of Items whose MergePopulations are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        RequestTooLargeException - If the number of specified ItemIdentifiers is higher than the server-imposed limit.
        Since:
        4.0

      • retrieveMergeHistories

        List<MergeHistory> retrieveMergeHistories(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers,
                                          int depth)
                                   throws RequestTooLargeException,
                                          InvalidArgumentException
        Retrieves MergeHistorys that contain summary information about any Items that were merged to create the specified Items, up to the specified depth.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifiers - ItemIdentifiers of the Items whose merge history is to be retrieved.
        depth - The maximum depth of merges to consider when retrieving the merge history.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        RequestTooLargeException - If the number of ItemIdentifiers is higher than the server-imposed limit.
        InvalidArgumentException - If the specified maximum depth is not greater than zero.
        Since:
        4.0
